member.name: T:DwC_A.Builders.BuilderContext
member.summary: A directory context where files should be written while building an archive. The default context may be used to assemble files in a temporary directory which will be cleaned up after the archive is compressed.

member.name: M:DwC_A.Builders.BuilderContext.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructor for custom context. To use a temporary directory to assemble files use the static Default property.
member.param: Provide the absolute path to a folder where the archive files will be written.
If set to true then the folder will be deleted after the archive is written.

member.summary: Returns a default context that uses a temporary directory.

member.summary: When set to true then the folder will be deleted after the archive is written.

member.summary: Call this method to delete the folder after the archive has be compressed.

member.summary: Determines the row strategy of the RowFactory

member.name: F:DwC_A.Config.RowStrategy.Lazy
member.summary: Reads fields as they are consumed. Use this when consuming fields in index order or only reading some of the fields in a row.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Config.RowStrategy.Greedy
member.summary: Parses all fields in a row and stores them in an array. Use this strategy when consuming all fields in random or reverse index order.

member.summary: Configuration options for the RowFactory

summary.para: Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der Klasse.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der Klasse.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der Klasse.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Ruft einen Wert ab, der angibt, ob die Index-Eigenschaft spezifiziert ist, oder legt diesen fest.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Index property is specified.
The index number of the column this field is represented in the source file(s). Indices start with 0.
Ruft einen Wert ab, der angibt, ob die Index-Eigenschaft spezifiziert ist, oder legt diesen fest.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Index property is specified.
The unique, qualified identifier for the term, usually a URI. E.g. http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/scientificName
A global default value that should be used in case the field doesnt have a column index or the actual value for the source record is NULL.

A URI that identifies a vocabulary used for the values found for the field in the source files. The URI ideally should resolve to some machine readable definition like SKOS, RDF, the GBIF vocabulary schema or a simple text file as often found for ISO or RFC standards. E.g. http://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/nomenclatural_code.xml; http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3066.txt; http://www.iso.org/iso/list-en1-semic-3.txt
Indicates an optional delimiter used for concatenating multiple values in a list.
Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der Klasse.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
Ruft einen Wert ab, der angibt, ob die Extension-Collection leer ist.
Gets a value indicating whether the Extension collection is empty.
Initialisiert eine neue Instanz der Klasse.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.acceptedNameUsage
member.summary: The full name, with authorship and date information if known, of the currently valid (zoological) or accepted (botanical) taxon.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.acceptedNameUsageID
member.summary: An identifier for the name usage (documented meaning of the name according to a source) of the currently valid (zoological) or accepted (botanical) taxon.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.accessRights
member.summary: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.associatedMedia
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, global unique identifier, URI) of media associated with the Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.associatedOccurrences
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers of other Occurrence records and their associations to this Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.associatedOrganisms
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers of other Organisms and their associations to this Organism.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.associatedReferences
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, bibliographic reference, global unique identifier, URI) of literature associated with the Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.associatedSequences
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, global unique identifier, URI) of genetic sequence information associated with the Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.associatedTaxa
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers or names of taxa and their associations with the Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.basisOfRecord
member.summary: The specific nature of the data record.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.bed
member.summary: The full name of the lithostratigraphic bed from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.behavior
member.summary: The behavior shown by the subject at the time the Occurrence was recorded.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.bibliographicCitation
member.summary: A bibliographic reference for the resource as a statement indicating how this record should be cited (attributed) when used.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.catalogNumber
member.summary: An identifier (preferably unique) for the record within the data set or collection.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.class
member.summary: The full scientific name of the class in which the taxon is classified.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.collectionCode
member.summary: The name, acronym, coden, or initialism identifying the collection or data set from which the record was derived.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.collectionID
member.summary: An identifier for the collection or dataset from which the record was derived.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.continent
member.summary: The name of the continent in which the Location occurs.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.coordinatePrecision
member.summary: A decimal representation of the precision of the coordinates given in the decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.coordinateUncertaintyInMeters
member.summary: The horizontal distance (in meters) from the given decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude describing the smallest circle containing the whole of the Location. Leave the value empty if the uncertainty is unknown, cannot be estimated, or is not applicable (because there are no coordinates). Zero is not a valid value for this term.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.country
member.summary: The name of the country or major administrative unit in which the Location occurs.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.countryCode
member.summary: The standard code for the country in which the Location occurs.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.county
member.summary: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than stateProvince (county, shire, department, etc.) in which the Location occurs.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.dataGeneralizations
member.summary: Actions taken to make the shared data less specific or complete than in its original form. Suggests that alternative data of higher quality may be available on request.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.datasetID
member.summary: An identifier for the set of data. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to a collection or institution.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.datasetName
member.summary: The name identifying the data set from which the record was derived.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.dateIdentified
member.summary: The date on which the subject was determined as representing the Taxon.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.day
member.summary: The integer day of the month on which the Event occurred.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.decimalLatitude
member.summary: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, using the spatial reference system given in geodeticDatum) of the geographic center of a Location. Positive values are north of the Equator, negative values are south of it. Legal values lie between -90 and 90, inclusive.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.decimalLongitude
member.summary: The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees, using the spatial reference system given in geodeticDatum) of the geographic center of a Location. Positive values are east of the Greenwich Meridian, negative values are west of it. Legal values lie between -180 and 180, inclusive.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.disposition
member.summary: The current state of a specimen with respect to the collection identified in collectionCode or collectionID.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.dynamicProperties
member.summary: A list of additional measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions about the record. Meant to provide a mechanism for structured content.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.earliestAgeOrLowestStage
member.summary: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic age or lowest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.earliestEonOrLowestEonothem
member.summary: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic eon or lowest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name ("Precambrian") attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.earliestEpochOrLowestSeries
member.summary: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic epoch or lowest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.earliestEraOrLowestErathem
member.summary: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic era or lowest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.earliestPeriodOrLowestSystem
member.summary: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic period or lowest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.endDayOfYear
member.summary: The latest integer day of the year on which the Event occurred (1 for January 1, 365 for December 31, except in a leap year, in which case it is 366).

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.establishmentMeans
member.summary: The process by which the biological individual(s) represented in the Occurrence became established at the location.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.Event
member.summary: An action that occurs at some location during some time.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.eventDate
member.summary: The date-time or interval during which an Event occurred. For occurrences, this is the date-time when the event was recorded. Not suitable for a time in a geological context.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.eventID
member.summary: An identifier for the set of information associated with an Event (something that occurs at a place and time). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.eventRemarks
member.summary: Comments or notes about the Event.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.eventTime
member.summary: The time or interval during which an Event occurred.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.family
member.summary: The full scientific name of the family in which the taxon is classified.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.fieldNotes
member.summary: One of a) an indicator of the existence of, b) a reference to (publication, URI), or c) the text of notes taken in the field about the Event.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.fieldNumber
member.summary: An identifier given to the event in the field. Often serves as a link between field notes and the Event.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.footprintSpatialFit
member.summary: The ratio of the area of the footprint (footprintWKT) to the area of the true (original, or most specific) spatial representation of the Location. Legal values are 0, greater than or equal to 1, or undefined. A value of 1 is an exact match or 100% overlap. A value of 0 should be used if the given footprint does not completely contain the original representation. The footprintSpatialFit is undefined (and should be left empty) if the original representation is a point without uncertainty and the given georeference is not that same point (without uncertainty). If both the original and the given georeference are the same point, the footprintSpatialFit is 1.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.footprintSRS
member.summary: A Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of the Spatial Reference System (SRS) for the footprintWKT of the Location. Do not use this term to describe the SRS of the decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude, even if it is the same as for the footprintWKT - use the geodeticDatum instead.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.footprintWKT
member.summary: A Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of the shape (footprint, geometry) that defines the Location. A Location may have both a point-radius representation (see decimalLatitude) and a footprint representation, and they may differ from each other.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.formation
member.summary: The full name of the lithostratigraphic formation from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.FossilSpecimen
member.summary: A preserved specimen that is a fossil.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.genus
member.summary: The full scientific name of the genus in which the taxon is classified.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.geodeticDatum
member.summary: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system (SRS) upon which the geographic coordinates given in decimalLatitude and decimalLongitude as based.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.GeologicalContext
member.summary: Geological information, such as stratigraphy, that qualifies a region or place.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.geologicalContextID
member.summary: An identifier for the set of information associated with a GeologicalContext (the location within a geological context, such as stratigraphy). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.georeferencedBy
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who determined the georeference (spatial representation) for the Location.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.georeferencedDate
member.summary: The date on which the Location was georeferenced.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.georeferenceProtocol
member.summary: A description or reference to the methods used to determine the spatial footprint, coordinates, and uncertainties.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.georeferenceRemarks
member.summary: Notes or comments about the spatial description determination, explaining assumptions made in addition or opposition to the those formalized in the method referred to in georeferenceProtocol.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.georeferenceSources
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of maps, gazetteers, or other resources used to georeference the Location, described specifically enough to allow anyone in the future to use the same resources.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.georeferenceVerificationStatus
member.summary: A categorical description of the extent to which the georeference has been verified to represent the best possible spatial description.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.group
member.summary: The full name of the lithostratigraphic group from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.habitat
member.summary: A category or description of the habitat in which the Event occurred.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.higherClassification
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of taxa names terminating at the rank immediately superior to the taxon referenced in the taxon record.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.higherGeography
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of geographic names less specific than the information captured in the locality term.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.higherGeographyID
member.summary: An identifier for the geographic region within which the Location occurred.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.highestBiostratigraphicZone
member.summary: The full name of the highest possible geological biostratigraphic zone of the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.HumanObservation
member.summary: An output of a human observation process.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.Identification
member.summary: A taxonomic determination (e.g., the assignment to a taxon).

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.identificationID
member.summary: An identifier for the Identification (the body of information associated with the assignment of a scientific name). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.identificationQualifier
member.summary: A brief phrase or a standard term ("cf.", "aff.") to express the determiner's doubts about the Identification.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.identificationReferences
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of references (publication, global unique identifier, URI) used in the Identification.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.identificationRemarks
member.summary: Comments or notes about the Identification.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.identificationVerificationStatus
member.summary: A categorical indicator of the extent to which the taxonomic identification has been verified to be correct.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.identifiedBy
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who assigned the Taxon to the subject.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.individualCount
member.summary: The number of individuals represented present at the time of the Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.informationWithheld
member.summary: Additional information that exists, but that has not been shared in the given record.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.infraspecificEpithet
member.summary: The name of the lowest or terminal infraspecific epithet of the scientificName, excluding any rank designation.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.institutionCode
member.summary: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.institutionID
member.summary: An identifier for the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.island
member.summary: The name of the island on or near which the Location occurs.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.islandGroup
member.summary: The name of the island group in which the Location occurs.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.kingdom
member.summary: The full scientific name of the kingdom in which the taxon is classified.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.language
member.summary: A language of the resource.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.latestAgeOrHighestStage
member.summary: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic age or highest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.latestEonOrHighestEonothem
member.summary: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic eon or highest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name ("Precambrian") attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.latestEpochOrHighestSeries
member.summary: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic epoch or highest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.latestEraOrHighestErathem
member.summary: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic era or highest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.latestPeriodOrHighestSystem
member.summary: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic period or highest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.license
member.summary: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.lifeStage
member.summary: The age class or life stage of the biological individual(s) at the time the Occurrence was recorded.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.lithostratigraphicTerms
member.summary: The combination of all litho-stratigraphic names for the rock from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.LivingSpecimen
member.summary: A specimen that is alive.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.locality
member.summary: The specific description of the place. Less specific geographic information can be provided in other geographic terms (higherGeography, continent, country, stateProvince, county, municipality, waterBody, island, islandGroup). This term may contain information modified from the original to correct perceived errors or standardize the description.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.Location
member.summary: A spatial region or named place.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.locationAccordingTo
member.summary: Information about the source of this Location information. Could be a publication (gazetteer), institution, or team of individuals.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.locationID
member.summary: An identifier for the set of location information (data associated with dcterms:Location). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.locationRemarks
member.summary: Comments or notes about the Location.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.lowestBiostratigraphicZone
member.summary: The full name of the lowest possible geological biostratigraphic zone of the stratigraphic horizon from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.MachineObservation
member.summary: An output of a machine observation process.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.MaterialSample
member.summary: A physical result of a sampling (or subsampling) event. In biological collections, the material sample is typically collected, and either preserved or destructively processed.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.materialSampleID
member.summary: An identifier for the MaterialSample (as opposed to a particular digital record of the material sample). In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make the materialSampleID globally unique.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.maximumDepthInMeters
member.summary: The greater depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in meters.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.maximumDistanceAboveSurfaceInMeters
member.summary: The greater distance in a range of distance from a reference surface in the vertical direction, in meters. Use positive values for locations above the surface, negative values for locations below. If depth measures are given, the reference surface is the location given by the depth, otherwise the reference surface is the location given by the elevation.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.maximumElevationInMeters
member.summary: The upper limit of the range of elevation (altitude, usually above sea level), in meters.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementAccuracy
member.summary: The description of the potential error associated with the measurementValue.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementDeterminedBy
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who determined the value of the MeasurementOrFact.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementDeterminedDate
member.summary: The date on which the MeasurementOrFact was made.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementID
member.summary: An identifier for the MeasurementOrFact (information pertaining to measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementMethod
member.summary: A description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.MeasurementOrFact
member.summary: A measurement of or fact about an rdfs:Resource (http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Resource).

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementRemarks
member.summary: Comments or notes accompanying the MeasurementOrFact.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementType
member.summary: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementUnit
member.summary: The units associated with the measurementValue.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.measurementValue
member.summary: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.member
member.summary: The full name of the lithostratigraphic member from which the cataloged item was collected.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.minimumDepthInMeters
member.summary: The lesser depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in meters.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.minimumDistanceAboveSurfaceInMeters
member.summary: The lesser distance in a range of distance from a reference surface in the vertical direction, in meters. Use positive values for locations above the surface, negative values for locations below. If depth measures are given, the reference surface is the location given by the depth, otherwise the reference surface is the location given by the elevation.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.minimumElevationInMeters
member.summary: The lower limit of the range of elevation (altitude, usually above sea level), in meters.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.modified
member.summary: The most recent date-time on which the resource was changed.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.month
member.summary: The integer month in which the Event occurred.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.municipality
member.summary: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than county (city, municipality, etc.) in which the Location occurs. Do not use this term for a nearby named place that does not contain the actual location.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.nameAccordingTo
member.summary: The reference to the source in which the specific taxon concept circumscription is defined or implied - traditionally signified by the Latin "sensu" or "sec." (from secundum, meaning "according to"). For taxa that result from identifications, a reference to the keys, monographs, experts and other sources should be given.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.nameAccordingToID
member.summary: An identifier for the source in which the specific taxon concept circumscription is defined or implied. See nameAccordingTo.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.namePublishedIn
member.summary: A reference for the publication in which the scientificName was originally established under the rules of the associated nomenclaturalCode.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.namePublishedInID
member.summary: An identifier for the publication in which the scientificName was originally established under the rules of the associated nomenclaturalCode.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.namePublishedInYear
member.summary: The four-digit year in which the scientificName was published.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.nomenclaturalCode
member.summary: The nomenclatural code (or codes in the case of an ambiregnal name) under which the scientificName is constructed.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.nomenclaturalStatus
member.summary: The status related to the original publication of the name and its conformance to the relevant rules of nomenclature. It is based essentially on an algorithm according to the business rules of the code. It requires no taxonomic opinion.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.Occurrence
member.summary: An existence of an Organism (sensu http://rs.tdwg.org/dwc/terms/Organism) at a particular place at a particular time.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.occurrenceID
member.summary: An identifier for the Occurrence (as opposed to a particular digital record of the occurrence). In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make the occurrenceID globally unique.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.occurrenceRemarks
member.summary: Comments or notes about the Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.occurrenceStatus
member.summary: A statement about the presence or absence of a Taxon at a Location.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.order
member.summary: The full scientific name of the order in which the taxon is classified.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.Organism
member.summary: A particular organism or defined group of organisms considered to be taxonomically homogeneous.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.organismID
member.summary: An identifier for the Organism instance (as opposed to a particular digital record of the Organism). May be a globally unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.organismName
member.summary: A textual name or label assigned to an Organism instance.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.organismQuantity
member.summary: A number or enumeration value for the quantity of organisms.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.organismQuantityType
member.summary: The type of quantification system used for the quantity of organisms.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.organismRemarks
member.summary: Comments or notes about the Organism instance.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.organismScope
member.summary: A description of the kind of Organism instance. Can be used to indicate whether the Organism instance represents a discrete organism or if it represents a particular type of aggregation.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.originalNameUsage
member.summary: The taxon name, with authorship and date information if known, as it originally appeared when first established under the rules of the associated nomenclaturalCode. The basionym (botany) or basonym (bacteriology) of the scientificName or the senior/earlier homonym for replaced names.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.originalNameUsageID
member.summary: An identifier for the name usage (documented meaning of the name according to a source) in which the terminal element of the scientificName was originally established under the rules of the associated nomenclaturalCode.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.otherCatalogNumbers
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of previous or alternate fully qualified catalog numbers or other human-used identifiers for the same Occurrence, whether in the current or any other data set or collection.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.ownerInstitutionCode
member.summary: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having ownership of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.parentEventID
member.summary: An identifier for the broader Event that groups this and potentially other Events.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.parentNameUsage
member.summary: The full name, with authorship and date information if known, of the direct, most proximate higher-rank parent taxon (in a classification) of the most specific element of the scientificName.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.parentNameUsageID
member.summary: An identifier for the name usage (documented meaning of the name according to a source) of the direct, most proximate higher-rank parent taxon (in a classification) of the most specific element of the scientificName.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.phylum
member.summary: The full scientific name of the phylum or division in which the taxon is classified.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.pointRadiusSpatialFit
member.summary: The ratio of the area of the point-radius (decimalLatitude, decimalLongitude, coordinateUncertaintyInMeters) to the area of the true (original, or most specific) spatial representation of the Location. Legal values are 0, greater than or equal to 1, or undefined. A value of 1 is an exact match or 100% overlap. A value of 0 should be used if the given point-radius does not completely contain the original representation. The pointRadiusSpatialFit is undefined (and should be left empty) if the original representation is a point without uncertainty and the given georeference is not that same point (without uncertainty). If both the original and the given georeference are the same point, the pointRadiusSpatialFit is 1.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.preparations
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of preparations and preservation methods for a specimen.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.PreservedSpecimen
member.summary: A specimen that has been preserved.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.previousIdentifications
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of previous assignments of names to the Organism.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.recordedBy
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations responsible for recording the original Occurrence. The primary collector or observer, especially one who applies a personal identifier (recordNumber), should be listed first.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.recordNumber
member.summary: An identifier given to the Occurrence at the time it was recorded. Often serves as a link between field notes and an Occurrence record, such as a specimen collector's number.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.references
member.summary: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.relatedResourceID
member.summary: An identifier for a related resource (the object, rather than the subject of the relationship).

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.relationshipAccordingTo
member.summary: The source (person, organization, publication, reference) establishing the relationship between the two resources.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.relationshipEstablishedDate
member.summary: The date-time on which the relationship between the two resources was established.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.relationshipOfResource
member.summary: The relationship of the resource identified by relatedResourceID to the subject (optionally identified by the resourceID).

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.relationshipRemarks
member.summary: Comments or notes about the relationship between the two resources.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.reproductiveCondition
member.summary: The reproductive condition of the biological individual(s) represented in the Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.resourceID
member.summary: An identifier for the resource that is the subject of the relationship.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.ResourceRelationship
member.summary: A relationship of one rdfs:Resource (http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Resource) to another.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.resourceRelationshipID
member.summary: An identifier for an instance of relationship between one resource (the subject) and another (relatedResource, the object).

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.rightsHolder
member.summary: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.sampleSizeUnit
member.summary: The unit of measurement of the size (time duration, length, area, or volume) of a sample in a sampling event.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.sampleSizeValue
member.summary: A numeric value for a measurement of the size (time duration, length, area, or volume) of a sample in a sampling event.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.samplingEffort
member.summary: The amount of effort expended during an Event.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.samplingProtocol
member.summary: The name of, reference to, or description of the method or protocol used during an Event.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.scientificName
member.summary: The full scientific name, with authorship and date information if known. When forming part of an Identification, this should be the name in lowest level taxonomic rank that can be determined. This term should not contain identification qualifications, which should instead be supplied in the IdentificationQualifier term.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.scientificNameAuthorship
member.summary: The authorship information for the scientificName formatted according to the conventions of the applicable nomenclaturalCode.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.scientificNameID
member.summary: An identifier for the nomenclatural (not taxonomic) details of a scientific name.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.sex
member.summary: The sex of the biological individual(s) represented in the Occurrence.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.specificEpithet
member.summary: The name of the first or species epithet of the scientificName.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.startDayOfYear
member.summary: The earliest integer day of the year on which the Event occurred (1 for January 1, 365 for December 31, except in a leap year, in which case it is 366).

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.stateProvince
member.summary: The name of the next smaller administrative region than country (state, province, canton, department, region, etc.) in which the Location occurs.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.subgenus
member.summary: The full scientific name of the subgenus in which the taxon is classified. Values should include the genus to avoid homonym confusion.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.Taxon
member.summary: A group of organisms (sensu http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/OBI_0100026) considered by taxonomists to form a homogeneous unit.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.taxonConceptID
member.summary: An identifier for the taxonomic concept to which the record refers - not for the nomenclatural details of a taxon.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.taxonID
member.summary: An identifier for the set of taxon information (data associated with the Taxon class). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.taxonomicStatus
member.summary: The status of the use of the scientificName as a label for a taxon. Requires taxonomic opinion to define the scope of a taxon. Rules of priority then are used to define the taxonomic status of the nomenclature contained in that scope, combined with the experts opinion. It must be linked to a specific taxonomic reference that defines the concept.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.taxonRank
member.summary: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the scientificName.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.taxonRemarks
member.summary: Comments or notes about the taxon or name.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.type
member.summary: The nature or genre of the resource.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.typeStatus
member.summary: A list (concatenated and separated) of nomenclatural types (type status, typified scientific name, publication) applied to the subject.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.UseWithIRI
member.summary: The category of terms that are recommended to have an IRI as a value.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimCoordinates
member.summary: The verbatim original spatial coordinates of the Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in verbatimCoordinateSystem.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimCoordinateSystem
member.summary: The coordinate format for the verbatimLatitude and verbatimLongitude or the verbatimCoordinates of the Location.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimDepth
member.summary: The original description of the depth below the local surface.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimElevation
member.summary: The original description of the elevation (altitude, usually above sea level) of the Location.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimEventDate
member.summary: The verbatim original representation of the date and time information for an Event.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimLatitude
member.summary: The verbatim original latitude of the Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in verbatimCoordinateSystem.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimLocality
member.summary: The original textual description of the place.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimLongitude
member.summary: The verbatim original longitude of the Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in verbatimCoordinateSystem.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimSRS
member.summary: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system (SRS) upon which coordinates given in verbatimLatitude and verbatimLongitude, or verbatimCoordinates are based.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.verbatimTaxonRank
member.summary: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the scientificName as it appears in the original record.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.vernacularName
member.summary: A common or vernacular name.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.waterBody
member.summary: The name of the water body in which the Location occurs.

member.name: F:DwC_A.Terms.Terms.year
member.summary: The four-digit year in which the Event occurred, according to the Common Era Calendar.
